title: Deckard - RTS Voice Pack Vol 1 by Replica Studios
description: We've used Replica Studios to create a voice pack with 150 unique voice lines for an RTS style game
longDescription:
We've used Replica Studios to create a voice pack with 150 unique voice lines for an RTS style game. Each line is performed in four different styles. This asset includes 600 WAV audio files in total. These are perfect for using as placeholders or prototyping your game.


If one of the lines doesn't quite work, Replica Studios is offering a free trial with 30 minutes of voice generation, so you can edit any of these voice lines or create your own.


  • 150 unique lines
  • Performed by Deckard, one of our AI voice actors
  • 4 different styles for each line
  • 600 WAV audio files in total


> YouTube demo of voice lines

> Google Doc with all lines and files names


Find out more about Replica Studios and view demo video:Â www.replicastudios.com


  • 30+ AI voice actors to choose from (and growing!)
  • Add dialogue and scripts, synthesize high-quality speech in seconds
  • Fine-tune controls over pitch, pacing, and intonation
  • All 'takes' saved to your local Content Browser
  • Royalty-free to use commercially


Join us in our Discord server if you have any questions, find a bug, or need help: https://discord.gg/j8VYGcJySE
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 150 unique lines
  • Performed by Deckard, one of our AI voice actors
  • 4 different styles for each line
  • 600 WAV audio files in total


Number of Audio Waves: 600

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Do Sound FX loop: (No)

Minutes of audio provided: ~9 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
